data.message:
Are you moving up to Dublin for the first time? Didn't get Halls, but don't want to suffer from FOMO? Good stuff, because we're running an event on Monday at Tivoli before Coisir. This pre-party is for freshers who have moved up to Dublin and are living in houses, digs or apartments.

https://www.facebook.com/events/341678926173412/

A RECAP OF THE WEEK

So it’s just one day until you can buy your early bird tickets for the whole week. You should get everything ready by downloading our new ticketing app through the link below because these tickets sell out faster than Katherine Zappone!
https://dice.fm/

It all kicks off for real from 7pm tomorrow when first rounds of tickets go on sale with special access code we release on the page. Before that we will be announcing the winners of all those wonderful like & share competitions at 5pm so there’s still time to enter them all!

Next week we will be showing what’s happening at every event and letting you get to know all the wonderful societies there are in Trinity. From the FRESHERS BALL headliner to just how much money we spent on glitter, all will be revealed soon.

If you missed anything don’t you worry here it all is again, but these are only the night events, there’s so much more to come! :D

Monday: Cóisir//DAITHÍ//Katie Laffan
https://www.facebook.com/events/1786712664905855/?ti=ia

Tuesday: CarnivLaw
https://www.facebook.com/events/502015753331134/

Wednesday: Freshers ball
https://www.facebook.com/events/295586397479604/

Thursday: House of Hatters
https://www.facebook.com/events/144334812684489/

Friday: Still not giving that away ;)

See you all in one week!

Congrats to Jenny Molloy for winning our like & share competition! You have free tonight with 4 other mates!

For all other Trinity students, remember it's only €6 entry when you show your Trinity ID at the door.

We'll see you tonight for some Duff beers and Flaming Moes.

3 Days until you can buy your Freshers' Week wristband online. These wristbands will give you access to EVERY night of Freshers' Week, but there's only a limited number of these week-long wristbands!

Details of how to purchase your wristband online will be available on Saturday, so watch this space.

Join Trinity Ents & Milhouse this Thursday at Hangar for €2 vodka + Redbulls, Flaming Moes and cool Duff beers.

No only that, but if you show your Trinity ID at the door you'll €2 off cheaplist - that's only €6 for entry!

See you at Hangar on Thursday!

Heyo, coming to Milhouse this Thursday, but worried about the bus strikes?

Fear not! Uber are offering HALF PRICE on Uber journeys. More information here: http://bit.ly/2cASIib

Hailo are also offering doing half price during certain hours: 
http://bit.ly/2cASIib

Join the event now: https://www.facebook.com/events/1675367409446454/

• • • LIKE & SHARE • • •

Day 2. Two more tickets up for grabs. We just can't stop!

This time in Opium Rooms we promise a night of classic entertainment with performers of the great circus arts and banging tunes to match!

Keep your eyes open as Law Soc, DU Dance and DU Juggling & Circus Arts put on the show of a lifetime!

• • • LIKE & SHARE • • •

We're giving FIVE people FREE entry into Milhouse this Thursday. What do you have to do?
 
 •  Like Trinity Ents on Facebook
 •  Click attending & share the event

The night promises great music and €2 vodka + Redbulls! Remember it's also only €6 entry at the door when you show your Trinity ID.

We'll see you there this Thursday!

And our Metropolis tickets winner is.......Carla McPeake!

Call into our SU shop to pick up your tickets some time after Wednesday next week. As for the rest of you don't you worry,there are discount tickets on sale from Wednesday in house 6.

 •  2 Day tickets: 135 yoyos
 •  1 day tickets: 65 yoyos
 •  Thursday ticket: 30 yoyos

There will be more ticket giveaways this week for our freshers week too so keep your eyes peeled!

;)

HOMERPALOOZA!

We've teamed up with the guys at Milhouse to offer a special discount rate for Trinity students for next Thursday's HOMERPALOOZA at Hangar!

Regular cheaplist is €8, but it's €6 when you present a valid Trinity ID.

The night promises some Flaming Moes, Atomic Squishes and even some ice cold Duff Beers - with house, techno and feel good music all night.
We've teamed up with with one of Dublin's biggest club nights to offer Trinity students an EXCLUSIVE deal. More details to be announced after 5pm.

• • • LIKE & SHARE • • •
Like our page and share this post for a chance to win 2 tickets to Metropolis! Its not just freshers week and mad events here from Trinity Ents, we often sell discount tickets in the SU shop all year long for you music lovers!

  
• • • TICKET DISCOUNTS • • •
So with a seriously tasty line up we at Trinity Ents have arranged for tickets to be sold at some great prices just for you Trinity Students. The Winner will be announced on Sunday night and the Tickets will be on sale in the SU shop from 
Wednesday next week!

Even if you don't win the freebies expect to make some great savings on the tickets regardless with the prices below!!

 •  2 Day tickets: 135 yoyos
 •  1 day tickets: 65 yoyos
 •  Thursday ticket: 30 yoyos

DISCLAIMER: Tickets cannot actually be purchased with Yo-Yo's.
This afternoon Trinity's American Football team will take on New York's Finest, the NYPD team. You should check out the game taking place in Santry at 3pm.

BAM! Every night is accounted for but we've only just started! Make sure to click attending to make sure you're up to date with the all the info you need. 

Watch out for more hype closer to Freshers Week...

https://www.facebook.com/events/1136803873075556/

TEASE - Make sure to click attending for details:
https://www.facebook.com/events/1136803873075556/

Watch this space and get ready for more info on what will promise to be the best (and messiest) week of your life:

https://www.facebook.com/events/1136803873075556/
